item.title: What Social Security says to do if you're incorrectly listed as dead
item.description: An incorrect report of death "can be devastating" SSA says, as restoring benefits is a long and challenging process.

item.title: Leslie Bibb on the shifting dynamics in "The White Lotus"
item.description: Leslie Bibb joins season three of HBO's "The White Lotus," set in Thailand, where rekindled friendships unravel in unexpected ways.

item.title: Oklahoma wildfires leave at least 4 dead, 200 injured, state officials say
item.description: More than 400 homes were damaged, Oklahoma officials said, and a red flag warning was in effect Tuesday.

item.title: Roberts says impeaching judges "not an appropriate response" to disagreement
item.description: The chief justice's statement came after President Trump called for a federal judge to be impeached.

item.title: Mar 18: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Israel launches deadly new strikes over Gaza; Astronauts head back to Earth after nine months in space.
